structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.history: Repealed 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 129. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3779a-1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Purposes for which private passway may be established -- Commissioners to make report.
